title: Sri Lanka drops Jayasuriya, Mendis for Asia Cup
content: COLOMBO, Sri Lanka (AFP) – Sri Lanka’s new cricket selection panel on Thursday left veteran batsman Sanath Jayasuriya out of the 15-man squad for next week’s Asia Cup. Selectors also dropped spinner Ajantha Mendis and included fast bowling all-rounder Farveez Maharoof for the four-nation limited-overs tournament against India, Pakistan and Bangladesh in Sri Lanka from…
